title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 251/78 of 7 February 1978 on the classification of goods under heading No 58.10 of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 251/78  of 7 February 1978  on the classification of goods under heading No 58.10 of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Plain-stitch embroidery, in the piece or in strips, with scalloped edges, shall be classified in the following heading of the Common Customs Tariff:
"58.10 Embroidery, in the piece, in strips or in motifs."

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
